name: Aspertia City Gym
rules: Each Colorless Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) gets +20 HP.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Energy Search
rules: Search your deck for a Basic Energy card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Great Ball
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Hugh
rules: Each player either draws or discards cards until he or she has 5 cards in his or her hand. (Your opponent does this first.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Poké Ball
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Potion
rules: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rocky Helmet
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Skyla
rules: Search your deck for a Trainer card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Switch
rules: Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Town Map
rules: Turn all of your Prize cards face up. (Those Prize cards remain face up for the rest of the game.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Computer Search
rules: Discard 2 cards from your hand. (If you can't discard 2 cards, you can't play this card.) Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Crystal Edge
rules: If this card is attached to White Kyurem-EX, each of its attacks does 50 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Crystal Wall
rules: If this card is attached to Black Kyurem-EX, its maximum HP is 300.

name: Gold Potion
rules: Heal 90 damage from your Active Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
